attributes.action: Enforce Sodomy Laws & Unnaturals Sexual Acts which still exist in British Law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prime Minister protect the Public.
Enforce Sodomy Laws & Unnatural Sexual Acts in British Law which are being ignored.
Brave Governments still protect Citizens in 80 or so Countries of this World punishing offenders, Why not ours.
